subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With 30 games left in the Japanese season, Wladimir Balentien was three homers shy of Sadaharu Oh’s single-season record. In the past, foreigners in that position have met obstacles.
snippet: With 30 games left in the Japanese season, Wladimir Balentien was three homers shy of Sadaharu Oh’s single-season record. In the past, foreigners in that position have met obstacles.
